titles.title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Marketing Act of 1946 to require country of origin labeling for processed food items.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

bill.summary: 9/26/2007--Introduced. Amends the Agricultural Marketing Act of 1946 to require country of origin labeling for processed food items. (Includes as a covered item under such Act.)
